column3: 2015 memory wall service info photos / videos donna marie ingram woods
column9: 2015 at lewis gale hospital in salem. donna was born on may 24
column10: 1963 to the late robert j. rea and the late betty rea. in addition to her parents she was also preceded in death by a sister cindy walthall simmons. donna is survived by her husband
column18: lorena nicole woods of ferrum; grandchildren
column20: anna. may nicole rahm and william alexander rahm all of ferrum; brother
column22: ronnie ellis ingram of stuart. the family will receive friends on tuesday
column24: 2015 from 7:00 to 8:00 pm at bassett funeral service chapel with a funeral service to follow at 8:00 pm with pastor kriss foley officiating.
